description: Manage your device privacy based on lock/unlock state Privacy Flip automatically manages your device's privacy features based on screen lock/unlock state. When you lock your device, it can disable Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, mobile data, location services, NFC, and even camera/microphone sensors. When you unlock, it intelligently restores the features you want back on. Works with Root OR Shizuku - Choose your preferred privilege method! Features: • Manage your device privacy based on lock/unlock state • Dual privilege support: Root OR Shizuku (no root required!) • Automatic privilege detection (Sui > Root > Shizuku) • Configurable feature control (Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Mobile Data, Location, NFC) • Experimental camera and microphone sensor privacy controls (Android 12+) • Customizable timing delays (0-60 seconds for both lock and unlock) • Background service for persistent monitoring • Quick Settings tile integration • Traditional Android Views with clean, efficient UI • Comprehensive logging and debugging Privacy Features Controlled: • Wi-Fi - Disable/enable wireless connectivity • Bluetooth - Control Bluetooth radio • Mobile data - Manage cellular data connection • Location services - Control GPS and location tracking • NFC - Control NFC sensor Experimental Features (Android 12+): • Camera - Disable/enable camera sensor privacy • Microphone - Disable/enable microphone sensor privacy Note: Camera and microphone controls require a timing window between screen lock and device lock. The app will warn you if your device is configured for instant locking. Requirements: • Android 7.0+ (API level 24) • Android 12+ (API level 31) for camera/microphone features Choose ONE privilege method: Option 1: Root Access (Recommended for rooted devices) • Root access via Magisk, SuperSU, or similar • Best performance with UID 0 privileges Option 2: Shizuku (No root required!) • Shizuku app installed and running • ADB privileges via USB or wireless debugging • Perfect for non-rooted devices Option 3: Sui (Best of both worlds) • Rooted device with Magisk • Sui Magisk module installed • Best user experience - automatic startup, no prompts The app requires elevated permissions to control system-level privacy features. All privacy actions are performed locally on the device with no data transmission. Privacy & Security: • Zero telemetry - No data sent to external servers • Local storage only - All settings stored on device • No network permissions - App cannot access internet • Open source - Full code transparency Usage: For Root users: 1. Open PrivacyFlip and grant root permissions when prompted 2. Configure your preferred privacy settings 3. Set lock/unlock delays if desired 4. The app works automatically in the background For Shizuku users: 1. Install and start Shizuku app (enable via ADB or wireless debugging) 2. Open PrivacyFlip and grant Shizuku permissions when prompted 3. Configure your preferred privacy settings 4. Set lock/unlock delays if desired 5. The app works automatically in the background Once configured, PrivacyFlip works automatically: • Lock your device → Selected features will be disabled • Unlock your device → Selected features will be restored
